channel.title: Nairpaa
channel.description: Here I write thoughts, stories, and technical posts from my journey in cyber security.

item.title: [HTB Challenges] Writeup CTF: Baby RE
item.description: Writeup CTF kategori reversing dari HTB Challenges: Baby RE. Diselesaikan dengan teknik static dan dynamic analysis menggunakan strings, ltrace, dan Ghidra.

item.title: Apa itu Secure Software Development Life Cycle (SSDLC)?
item.description: Mengenal SSDLC dengan bahasa santai dan mudah dimengerti.
